pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, February 18, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will participate in a meeting hosted by the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden, with the leaders of France, Germany, Italy, Poland, Romania, the United Kingdom, the European Union, and NATO, to discuss Ukraine.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will chair a meeting of the Incident Response Group on the illegal blockades.
